adjective.description: Relating to or denoting the main Lower Palaeolithic culture in Europe (preceding the Mousterian) and a similar culture in Africa. It is represented by hand-axe industries, which are dated as a whole to about 1,500,000–150,000 years ago.

origin: Early 20th century: from French Acheuléen, from St-Acheul near Amiens in northern France, where objects from this culture were found.
